examples: Smoking in public places is not allowed.
public.note: 'public' is often used before nouns: public transport, public library.

examples: Social media can spread news very fast.
The mass media influence public opinion.
media.note: Usually treated as a plural collective: 'The media are ...'

examples: She felt embarrassed when she forgot the lines.
embarrassed.note: Adjective; common with 'feel' or 'be embarrassed about'

examples: My phone has a big touch screen.
screen.note: Noun; compound nouns are common (touch screen, screen time).

device.note: Countable noun; often used with adjectives (electronic/mobile).

examples: I have to do my homework now.
